mods.note: This group of pages is titled, Map of Bolivar". It is a series of maps of Bolivar in Hardeman County, Tennessee. Each map covered a distinct section of town and covered two pages in the book. Communities used these maps for fire department and other planning. Insurance companies relied on them almost without question in deciding insurance contracts for builings and property. Each scanned image represents one page, or half of a map.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
